## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Slideshare
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: *.slideshare.net
- Responsive response: YES
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection , SlimProviderCollection
